resources.string: Ezt a videót nem lehet megnyitni
Nincs feljogosítva az UPNP szerver elérésére. Kérjük, előbb változtassa meg a hozzáférési beállításait.
Nincs film vagy sorozat leírás ehhez a videóhoz.
Kattintson egy évadra a benne lévő epizódok megnézettként vagy nem látottként jelőléshez
Click on a season to remove all its episodes from library
Click on a season to delete all its episodes
Mark all episodes watched or unwatched
"Please connect to a network first to be able to run this application."
Film nem található az online adatbázísban.
Nincs új feldolgozandó fájl ebben a mappában
However there are still %d videos for which no info was found formerly.
However there is still one video for which no info was found formerly.
You can search posters and info online for your videos by means of the \'Search info online\' menu.
You currently have no poster and description for your movies
You currently have no poster and description for your TV shows
Belső tárhely, SD kártya és USB tárhelyek újravizsgálata
Az összes fájl megjelenítése a böngészőben
Nyomja hosszan az ikont a feloldáshoz
Video and Audio streams are not INTERLEAVED.
Licenc nem található ehhez a fájlhoz.
This file contains an %1$s video format.
This file contains an %1$s audio format.
This file contains an %1$s video format and an %2$s audio format.
You can purchase additional codec plug-ins on www.archos.com.
You can purchase additional codec plug-ins on Google Play.

It looks like you already have additional codecs installed for Nova Video Player.

This new version of Nova Video Player requires an update of these codecs.

Please go to Google Play to update and re-install the codecs.
Válassza ki a feliratokat a tárhelyen
Associate this file to the video
You can copy more subtitles files to this folder in order to associate them to this video.
Select any of the available subtitles files to associate it with the video %s. The file will be renamed in order to match the name of the video.
No subtitles files found. You must copy first one or more subtitles files to this folder in order to associate them with the video %s.
Nem található feliratsáv ehhez a nyelvhez
All your videos already have at least one subtitles track. Do you want to force download of new subtitles tracks?
You must specify a valid username and password!
Provide your opensubtitles credentials in settings to be able to download subtitles
Incorrect opensubtitles credentials or service not available
Nova Video Player needs storage permission to read local videos, please, grant this permission.
Hiba a torrent letöltése során : nincs elég tárhely
Torrent-lejátszás csak a fizetett verzíóban elérhető
\"Tallózhat és lejátszhat tartalmat saját FTP szerverről\"
A parancsikon tartalma jelenleg nem elérhető.\nKérjük ellenőrizze, hogy rendelkezik-e a szükséges engedélyekkel.
Nincs hálózati parancsikon.\n\nParancsikon létrehozásához tartsa lenyomva a célmappa nevét és válassza ki a(z) \"%s\" opciót a fenti sávon.
To create shortcuts to your favorite remote folders, select \"%s\" in the top action bar when browsing a server.
Az összes videó azonnali hozzáadása a könyvtárhoz?
No network folders are currently indexed.\n\nYou can add the content of a network folder to the library by browsing to this folder and selecting \"%s\" in the top action bar.
No ftp folders are currently indexed.
Az UPnP indexelés nem támogat ugyanannyi funkciót, mint az SMB indexelés.\nSMB mappa indexelése javasolt, amennyiben ezt a szerver vagy a PC támogatja.\n
Sikertelen csatlakozás: ellenőrizze a kapcsolatot és a belépési adatokat
Szerezze meg a reklámmentes verzíót a Google Play-en
Buy the application license to remove the ads and enable all the features
You may try this option if some videos are not playing correctly
for HDMI and S/PDIF connections, transmit compressed audio. ⚠ Experimental may result in A/V out of sync
Always decode all channels and let Android downmix depending on audio output capability (can result in loosing voice channels)
Other compatible video player applications will be proposed by Android when launching a video playback. Be aware that some features will not work (resume, bookmarks, etc.)
Use this feature only if your 3D TV supports it
Remove judder effect by adapting best screen refresh rate to video frame rate (device support may vary)
Allow landscape fullscreen video on display with cutouts
Jelőlje be, ha alapértelmezetten szeretné elrejteni a feliratokat
Provide your opensubtitles credentials to be able to download subtitles
Válassza ki a letöltendő feliratok nyelveit
Choose your favorite language for reading subtitles
Choose between TV and Tablet/Phone UI
Use it only with VPN configuration, and beware of your data usage.
Enable network share on mobile connection
A modification on Trakt API requires a reconnection.
Automatically get info for new videos
Nyomja meg a felfelé nyilat\na TV menü megjelenítéséhez
Select the \"Add as shortcut\" option to quickly come back to your server.
Press this menu item to integrate the content of this folder and its subfolders to the Video Library.
Use the + button to integrate the content of this folder and its sub-folders to the Video Library.
It will allow you to get posters and descriptions for the movies and TV shows.
Press this menu item to search posters and descriptions online for your videos.
You have new videos that don\'t have information and posters yet.
Resume points and position bookmarks on network
Create thumbnails from remote videos when no poster available
Save and check for resume point and position bookmarks on network when possible
Enable network share SMB version 2 protocol support. ⚠ Experimental, may result in video playback not being able to start
Connection seems abnormally long. Would you like to reset it ?
This file is currently not indexed in your video library.\nSearching for posters and information is only available for indexed files.\nDo you want to index it now?
File is being processed. This can take a while.
Brightness cannot be changed because automatic brightness mode is currently enabled.
Boxee / XBMC \'.nfo\' fájlok beolvasása a keresés/újrakeresés során, médiaadatok és poszterek kinyeréséhez.
Do you want to mail your Video database to Nova development team in order to help them check a bug?\n\nThe video files are (of course) not mailed, but the full list of file names is.
Zipping a copy of the library before mailing it…
Kérjük, írja le a tapasztalt problémát\n\n
Advanced preference, may break video decoding.
Advanced preference, may break audio decoding.
Display or hide the button resuming the latest video in the main screen
Check to show a row with your currently watching and up next videos
Check to show a row with your last added media
Check to show a row with your last played media
Check to show a row with all your movies instead of the movie categories row
Select the sort order of the all movie row
Check to show a row with all your TV shows instead of the TV show categories row
Válassza ki a sorozatok rendezési sorrendjét
Set the encoding used in text subtitles
Android 4.3 is not supported yet.\nWe\'re working hard to fix it and hope to have a new version soon!
An issue with Trakt has been detected and credentials must be reset, please login again.
Share videos being watched on Trakt
Trakt scrobbler is only available with paid version
Synchronize TV show and movie collections
Use trakt resume position when more advanced than local
Automatically add all videos from your Nova library to your Trakt collection
For TV show, specify season and episode, like \"S01E01\"

While in private mode, the following features are disabled:
 - Auto-indexing and auto-scrapping of played videos
 - Recently played
 - Resume point
 - Trakt synchronisation

WiFi seems to be disabled on standby. To ensure success of auto-rescan, please set WiFi enable on standby.
Error: WiFi was off during rescan
Window mode needs special permissions to be displayed in front of other apps. Please, grant Nova Video Player this permission to switch to window mode.
Touch to cast videos to your TV
Nova Video needs special permission to access external storage. Please select your storage on next screen
Export media.db file to /sdcard for debug purposes

Exact subtitles not found for file %s
Please try among this list:
Switching to remote display mode might give more track options
every format supported by nova video player can be played using remote display. However, quality can be deteriorated.
Optimal quality but some format cannot be supported
Nova video player is currently in stream cast mode. \nThis results to a good video quality but might rise issues with audiotracks and subtitles. Try switching to Remote display cast mode.
Nova video player is currently in remote display mode. \nDepending on your device and your network quality, you might experience some quality loss and performance issues.

Cast support is limited due to the codec limitations of Chromecast. To mitigate these limitations, 2 cast modes are implemented: Chromecast and Screencast (with automatic fallback). Note that performance and quality issues can also be due to network or device limitations.
Sound won\'t work while Nova Video Player is in background
Nova Video Player can only play videos supported by your device. Due to license issues, some formats cannot be legally included, some other can be purchased on Google Play Store.
If you like this app, please support us by rating us 5 stars
No list currently detected. List can be created by adding new items directly from video info, or can be synced with your trakt account.
